hints.label: thm-main-explicit-rate
hints.title: Main Result: Explicit Convergence Rate
hints.content:
4151: :label: thm-main-explicit-rate
4152: 
4153: Under the assumptions of Stage 0.5 (QSD regularity R1-R6) and the parameter condition:
4154: 
4155: $$
4156: \sigma^2 > \sigma_{\text{crit}}^2 := \frac{2\lambda_{\text{LSI}} C_{\text{Fisher}}^{\text{coup}} + C_{\text{KL}}^{\text{coup}} + A_{\text{jump}}}{\lambda_{\text{LSI}}}
4157: $$
4158: 
4159: the mean-field Euclidean Gas converges exponentially to the QSD with rate:
4160: 
4161: $$
4162: \boxed{\alpha_{\text{net}} = \frac{1}{2}\left(\lambda_{\text{LSI}} \sigma^2 - 2\lambda_{\text{LSI}} C_{\text{Fisher}}^{\text{coup}} - C_{\text{KL}}^{\text{coup}} - A_{\text{jump}}\right)}
4163: $$
hints.raw_directive:
4148: ## 10. Conclusion
4149: 
4150: :::{prf:theorem} Main Result: Explicit Convergence Rate
4151: :label: thm-main-explicit-rate
4152: 
4153: Under the assumptions of Stage 0.5 (QSD regularity R1-R6) and the parameter condition:
4154: 
4155: $$
4156: \sigma^2 > \sigma_{\text{crit}}^2 := \frac{2\lambda_{\text{LSI}} C_{\text{Fisher}}^{\text{coup}} + C_{\text{KL}}^{\text{coup}} + A_{\text{jump}}}{\lambda_{\text{LSI}}}
4157: $$
4158: 
4159: the mean-field Euclidean Gas converges exponentially to the QSD with rate:
4160: 
4161: $$
4162: \boxed{\alpha_{\text{net}} = \frac{1}{2}\left(\lambda_{\text{LSI}} \sigma^2 - 2\lambda_{\text{LSI}} C_{\text{Fisher}}^{\text{coup}} - C_{\text{KL}}^{\text{coup}} - A_{\text{jump}}\right)}
4163: $$
4164:
